function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of COVID-19 in the built environment","Impact":"Health risks to construction workers and the community, potential project delays, and increased costs","Mitigation":"Implementing safety guidelines, promoting initiatives to reduce the spread of COVID-19, integrating safety processes","Technologies":"Digital technologies for remote work, contactless technologies, monitoring systems","People":"Construction workers, managers, engineers, community","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, engineers, local authorities"},{"Description":"Limited productivity on construction operations","Impact":"Slow progress on construction projects, potential delays, increased costs","Mitigation":"Managing risks effectively, implementing safety guidelines, addressing shortages of resources and skilled workers","Technologies":"Digital technologies for project management, monitoring systems, automation","People":"Construction workers, project managers, engineers","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, engineers"},{"Description":"Shortage of skilled workers and materials","Impact":"Potential delays and increased costs for construction projects, reduced productivity","Mitigation":"Training programs for skilled workers, addressing shortages of materials, exploring alternative materials and construction methods","Technologies":"Automation, monitoring systems, digital procurement systems","People":"Construction workers, project managers, engineers","Owner":"Construction companies, project managers, engineers"}]}
